SourceAnalyzer.Name: Layout Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Rules which enforce code layout and line spacing.

Rule.Name: CurlyBracketsForMultiLineStatementsMustNotShareLine
Rule.Context: If a statement spans multiple lines, the {0} curly bracket must be placed on its own line.
Rule.Description: Validates that the opening or closing curly bracket in a bracketed statement is placed on its own line if the statement spans multiple lines.

Rule.Name: StatementMustNotBeOnSingleLine
Rule.Context: A statement containing curly brackets must not be placed on a single line. The opening and closing curly brackets must each be placed on their own line.
Rule.Description: Validates that a bracketed statement is not placed on a single line.

Rule.Name: ElementMustNotBeOnSingleLine
Rule.Context: The {0} must not be placed on a single line. The opening and closing curly brackets must each be placed on their own line.
Rule.Description: Validates that a bracketed element is not placement on a single line.

Rule.Name: CurlyBracketsMustNotBeOmitted
Rule.Context: The body of the {0} must be wrapped in opening and closing curly brackets.
Rule.Description: Validates that opening and closing curly brackets are always included, even if the statement type allows them to be omitted.

Rule.Name: AllAccessorsMustBeMultiLineOrSingleLine
Rule.Context: An accessor can only be placed on a single line if all of the accessors in the {0} are placed on a single line.
Rule.Description: Validates that an accessor in a property or indexer is only placed on a single line if all accessors in the property or indexer are placed on a single line.

Rule.Name: OpeningCurlyBracketsMustNotBeFollowedByBlankLine
Rule.Context: An opening curly bracket must not be followed by a blank line.
Rule.Description: Validates that an opening curly bracket in a bracketed statement or element is not followed by a blank line.

Rule.Name: ElementDocumentationHeadersMustNotBeFollowedByBlankLine
Rule.Context: A documentation header line must not be followed by a blank line.
Rule.Description: Validates that a documentation header is not followed by a blank line.

Rule.Name: CodeMustNotContainMultipleBlankLinesInARow
Rule.Context: The code must not contain multiple blank lines in a row.
Rule.Description: Validates that the code does not contain multiple blank lines in a row.

Rule.Name: ClosingCurlyBracketsMustNotBePrecededByBlankLine
Rule.Context: A closing curly bracket must not be preceded by a blank line.
Rule.Description: Validates that a closing curly bracket in a bracketed statement or element is not preceded by a blank line.

Rule.Name: OpeningCurlyBracketsMustNotBePrecededByBlankLine
Rule.Context: An opening curly bracket must not be preceded by a blank line.
Rule.Description: Validates that an opening curly bracket in a bracketed statement or element is not preceded by a blank line.

Rule.Name: ChainedStatementBlocksMustNotBePrecededByBlankLine
Rule.Context: An else, catch, or finally statement must not be preceded by a blank line.
Rule.Description: Validates than an else, catch, or finally statement is not preceded by a blank line.

Rule.Name: WhileDoFooterMustNotBePrecededByBlankLine
Rule.Context: The while keyword in a do-while statement must not be preceded by a blank line.
Rule.Description: Validates that the while keyword in a do-while statement is not preceded by a blank line.

Rule.Name: SingleLineCommentsMustNotBeFollowedByBlankLine
Rule.Context: A single-line comment must not be followed by a blank line. To ignore this error when commenting out a line of code, begin the comment with '////' rather than '//'.
Rule.Description: Validates that a comment is not followed by a blank line. (This does not apply to C-style comments.)

Rule.Name: ClosingCurlyBracketMustBeFollowedByBlankLine
Rule.Context: Statements or elements wrapped in curly brackets must be followed by a blank line.
Rule.Description: Validates that a bracketed statement or element is followed by a blank line.

Rule.Name: ElementDocumentationHeaderMustBePrecededByBlankLine
Rule.Context: A documentation header must be preceded by a blank line or must be the first item in its scope.
Rule.Description: Validates that a documentation header is preceded by a blank line, or is the first item in its scope.

Rule.Name: SingleLineCommentMustBePrecededByBlankLine
Rule.Context: A single-line comment must be preceded by a blank line or another single-line comment, or must be the first item in its scope. To ignore this error when commenting out a line of code, begin the comment with '////' rather than '//'.
Rule.Description: Validates that a comment is preceded by a blank line, or is the first item in its scope.

Rule.Name: ElementsMustBeSeparatedByBlankLine
Rule.Context: Adjacent elements must be separated by a blank line.
Rule.Description: Validates that adjacent elements are separated by a blank line.

Rule.Name: CodeMustNotContainBlankLinesAtStartOfFile
Rule.Context: The code must not contain blank lines at the start of the file.
Rule.Description: Validates that the code does not contain blank lines at the start of the file.

Rule.Name: CodeMustNotContainBlankLinesAtEndOfFile
Rule.Context: The code must not contain blank lines at the end of the file.
Rule.Description: Validates that the code does not contain blank lines at the end of the file.
